title: Bihar PRD Technical Assistant Recruitment 2025
description: Bihar PRD Technical Assistant Recruitment 2025 Apply Online for 942 Post Post Update Date: 24 -06-2025 Short Description: Bihar PRD Technical Assistant Online Form 2025: Bihar Panchayati Raj Department has announced recruitment for Technical Assistant Post . Candidates who want to apply online can apply from the link given on Rojgar Result. Bihar PRD Technical Assistant Vacancy 2025 can be filled from 26 May 2025 to 25 June 2025.
